question.text: As well as planning your route before starting a journey, you should also plan an alternative route. Why is this?

explanation.text: It’s a good idea to plan an alternative route in case your original route is blocked for any reason. You’re less likely to feel worried and stressed if you’ve got an alternative in mind. This will enable you to concentrate fully on your driving or riding. Always carry a map that covers the area you will travel in.

answer.text: Your first route may be blocked
To avoid a railway level crossing
In case you have to avoid emergency vehicles
